2051940.name: INCLOSED
2051940.description:
You came for answers. Instead, you found the Fair.

Locked inside a rotting barn and its fairground grounds, you are forced to play by the rules of Lanky, a scarecrow whose games punish more than they kill. Each contest is a carnival trial â€” familiar, yet corrupted â€” and every mistake leaves you weaker.

And if RÌ´ÌŠÌ ÌœEÌ¶ÌÌƒÍ•Ì«Ì¦DÌ´ÍŠÌ‘Ì¾Í•Ì AÌµÍÍ€Ì“ÌÌ˜Ì¦CÌ´Ì“Í™TÌ¸ÍŒÍÌ’ÍÌ™EÌ¸Ì‘ÍŠÌÌ¹Í”DÌµÍ—Ì›Ì©Ì° wakes, even Lanky may not obey the rules.

Will you survive the fair, or will the fair consume you?

ğŸ® Features

  • Red Light / Green Light, Distorted
    Hide inside scarecrow cutouts to avoid Lankyâ€™s gaze. Early rounds feel safe, but cutouts decay â€” splintered, tilted, and unsafe â€” testing timing and observation.

  • Apple Bobbing â€” A Fatal Simon Says
    Three colored buckets, flickering bulbs, and a broken memory game. Wrong choices crack bulbs, escalate tension, and bring you closer to suffering.

  • The Price of Failure
    Lanky doesnâ€™t kill you right away. Instead, each failure cripples you â€” legs snap, sight blurs â€” forcing you to endure suffering while you continue playing.

  • The Toothpick Gamble
    When no one is left, the scarecrow offers a final test of pure chance: draw the shortest stick. The outcome decides whether you walk or crawl away.

  • Atmospheric Horror Setting
    Explore barns, fields, and fairground arenas where every object hides menace. From above, the layouts reveal something unsettling.

  • A Demo with a Bite
    Survive one of Lankyâ€™s games, endure the festivals secrets, and get a taste of whats to come of INCLOSED.
